src:
ONE stars in beautiful and cinematic short film titled 'BEAT Cinema Vol. 1'
01 Nov 2019, 19:29 by sl278
Former YGE artist ONE has starred in a beautiful short film titled “BEAT CINEMA VOL.1.”
The rapper is seen grooving to a track and singing to a groovy R&B song in a trendy blue suit. He's also seen performing other songs in a beautiful desert setting, further emphasizing the beauty of the entire film.
Check it out above!
